Title: Vice President, Global Modernization Practice
RoleDescription:
MongoDBs mission is to empower innovators to create, transform, and disrupt industries by unleashing the power of software and data. We enable organizations of all sizes to easily build, scale, and run modern applications by helping them modernize legacy workloads, embrace innovation, and unleash AI. Our industry-leading developer data platform, MongoDB Atlas, is the only globally distributed, multi-cloud database and is available in more than 115 regions across AWS, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. Atlas allows customers to build and run applications anywhereon premises, or across cloud providers. With offices worldwide and over 175,000 new developers signing up to use MongoDB every month, its no wonder that leading organizations, like Samsung and Toyota, trust MongoDB to build next-generation, AI-powered applications.
Were looking for a high-impact leader to build and drive our Global Modernization Factoryan elite team responsible for accelerating enterprise transformation with Services as a Software.
This is a build-and-scale role for a proven leader in application modernization consulting. You will own the strategy, execution, and impact of a high-performing consulting practice, delivering measurable business outcomes for customers through field-developed, AI-powered modernization tooling. Your mission: build the best, engineering-first modernization practice in the industry, delivering application and platform transformation at scale.
This is not a status quo role. We need a builder, a problem solver, and a business leadersomeone who thrives at the intersection of technical depth, customer strategy, and execution. If youre comfortable in ambiguity, energized by the challenge of scaling a world-class team, and ready to lead from the front, lets talk.
This role can be based out of our offices in NYC, Austin, Boston or remotely in Eastern & Central time zones of the United States.
What You Will Do

Build & Scale a Best-in-Class Modernization Business

Establish MongoDBs Modernization Factory as a competitive force, delivering measurable value for enterprises shifting away from legacy platforms
Develop and scale a services as a software business modelcontinuously building and improving AI-powered tooling, frameworks, automation, and playbooks to accelerate application transformation
Collaborate closely with a cross-functional go-to-market team for global practice strategy, execution, and impact, ensuring engagements directly contribute to MongoDBs growth and customer success
Drive innovation and repeatabilitycreating playbooks, methodologies, and intellectual property that differentiate our modernization services

Own Customer Outcomes & Execution Excellence

Lead a team of modernization expertsarchitects, developers, and leaders to deliver high-impact engagements for the worlds most complex enterprises
Partner with MongoDBs GTM field teams to drive expansion and upsell, increasing MongoDBs footprint through successful modernization engagements
Get in the trenchesroll up your sleeves when needed to solve tough technical, delivery, and commercial challenges alongside your team
Establish a culture of accountabilityensuring customer engagements deliver on scope, budget, and business objectives

Develop & Lead a High-Performance Team

Recruit, develop, and retain top-tier talenthiring leaders and practitioners who bring deep modernization experience and a builders mindset
Foster an engineering-first culturewhere leaders stay close to the technology and delivery teams are encouraged to solve problems through software innovation
Create a structured career growth and capability-building program, ensuring continuous development and scalability of the practice

Drive MongoDBs Modernization Strategy & Influence the Future of Professional Services

Shape MongoDBs modernization roadmap, collaborating with Product, Engineering, and GTM leadership to influence offerings and customer value
Be a thought leader in modernizationevangelizing best practices, contributing to industry discussions, and positioning MongoDB as the go-to platform for application modernization
Ensure seamless integration between GTM field teams to maximize revenue, customer success, and adoption


What Were Looking For

Proven leader in building, scaling, and running an application modernization practice at a leading systems integrator or high-growth software company
15+ years in consulting or professional services, with 5+ years leading modernization practices, delivering large-scale engagements
Deep technical knowledge of enterprise software architectures, cloud migration, application modernization, DevOps, and AI-driven transformation
Business acumen + technical depthcomfortable discussing P&L, GTM strategies, and revenue impact, while also engaging deeply in technical problem-solving
Hands-on leadernot afraid to dive into complex challenges, whether related to technical, delivery, or commercial situations
Proven track record of hiring, developing, and leading high-performing teams
Experience managing enterprise-scale customer relationships, including navigating escalations, influencing stakeholders, and driving customer success
Ability to work cross-functionally with Sales, Product, Customer Success, and Engineering to ensure the Modernization Factory is a business accelerant
Bias for actioncomfortable making bold decisions in a fast-paced, rapidly evolving environment

Success in This Role Means

MongoDBs modernization business is a recognized forcedelivering high-value, high-impact transformation for enterprise customers
Measured increase in customer consumption and expansion through successful modernization engagements
Playbooks and frameworks drive repeatability and scale, making the Modernization Factory a competitive differentiator
A world-class consulting teamhiring, growing, and developing the next generation of modernization leaders
Continuous innovation and iteration, ensuring MongoDB stays ahead of the market in modernization services
